Class LocationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.common.service.impl.LocationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class LocationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILocationService
    Provides access to the current location.

    sven

        Returns:

      • getCurrentLocation

        public Location getCurrentLocation()
        Returns the current location. Resets ILocationService.hasLocationChanged() to false. It can be null, if no location is available yet.
        Specified by:
        getCurrentLocation in interface ILocationService
        Returns:
        Current Location.
